metadata.name: Last Cathedral
metadata.description:
Last Cathedral

Year 3200...
Humans have progressed so much that they have been able to conquer space...
But there are still many disagreements between groups of people, so interstellar civilizations have emerged from different viewpoints , ideologies  and even old and new religions.
Among them all, a group of religious people have created a civilization based on Christianity to preserve their religion until the advent of Christ...
But they are always threatened by other civilizations, so they try to defend the last interstellar cathedral that is sacred to them, so that it will not be harmed in the midst of various wars...
--
As a collector of this piece, you will receive special features:
1. You can choose one (1/1) nft from "Millions of Cubes" collection as a gift.
2. If you decide to order a custom project (for Metaverse land, etc.), you will be given priority and  have a special discount.
3. In future, some special pieces & features will be available only for previous collectors.
